Sentencas: A novel hybrid system integrating solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SATEG) is proposed for enhanced performance.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: This study employs advanced numerical simulations and finite element analysis to explore the dynamic behavior and assess various parameters' impacts within this innovative system.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: The numerical methods undergo cross-validation by incorporating analytical and experimental data derived from existing literature.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: The research reveals that segmented configurations, which combine high-temperature materials (skutterudites) on the hot side and low-temperature materials (bismuth tellurides) on the cold side, outperform non-segmented setups in terms of power generation and thermoelectric efficiency.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: Moreover, the study emphasizes the crucial role of cell voltage in determining fuel cell efficiency and highlights the importance of tailored thermoelectric materials for specific temperature ranges.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: At an operating temperature of 900 degrees C and a cell voltage of 0.7, the segmented configuration boasts an approximately 76 % higher thermoelectric efficiency compared to its non-segmented counterpart.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: Additionally, the investigation explores the influence of height ratios within the segmented thermoelectric generator, demonstrating the need for customizing design parameters to optimize performance.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: Furthermore, the study delves into the effects of altering cathode and anode inlet velocities on key parameters.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: Increasing the anode inlet velocity enhances SOFC power density and efficiency, while higher cathode inlet velocities boost thermoelectric power generation and SATEG conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)

Sentencas: In summary, this research contributes valuable insights into the design and optimization of hybrid SOFC/SATEG systems, highlighting the advantages of segmented configurations and the importance of tailoring system parameters to specific operating conditions.
Titulo: Numerical modeling of a novel hybrid system composed of tubiform solid oxide fuel cell and segmented annular thermoelectric generator (SOFC/ SATEG)
